outline:
1. to ransom, redeem, rescue, deliver
    1. (Qal) to ransom
    2. (Niphal) to be ransomed
    3. (Hiphil) to allow one to be ransomed
    4. (Hophal) redeemed
kjv_def: [idiom] at all, deliver, [idiom] by any means, ransom, (that are to be, let be) redeem(-ed), rescue, [idiom] surely.
strongs_def: to sever, i.e. ransom; gener. to release, preserve
